traits.name: Fast Metabolism
traits.description: Your metabolic rate is twice normal. This means that you are much less resistant to radiation and poison, but your body heals faster.

traits.name: Bruiser
traits.description: A little slower, but a little bigger. You may not hit as often, but they will feel it when you do! Your total action points are lowered, but your Strength is increased.

traits.name: Small Frame
traits.description: You are not quite as big as other people, but that never slowed you down. You can't carry as much, but you are more agile.

traits.name: One Hander
traits.description: One of your hands is very dominant. You excel with single-handed weapons, but two-handed weapons cause a problem.

traits.name: Finesse
traits.description: Your attacks show a lot of finesse. You don't do as much damage, but you cause more critical hits.

traits.name: Kamikaze
traits.description: By not paying attention to any threats, you can act a lot faster in a turn. This lowers your Armor Class to just what you are wearing, but you sequence much faster in a combat turn.

traits.name: Heavy Handed
traits.description: You swing harder, not better. Your attacks are very brutal, but lack finesse. You rarely cause a good critical hit, but you always do more melee damage.

traits.name: Fast Shot
traits.description: You don't have time to aim for a targeted attack, because you attack faster than normal people. It costs you one less action point for guns and thrown weapons.

traits.name: Bloody Mess
traits.description: By some strange twist of fate, people around you die violently. You always see the worst way a person can die.

traits.name: Jinxed
traits.description: The good thing is that everyone around you has more critical failures in combat, the bad thing is - so do you!

traits.name: Good Natured
traits.description: You studied less-combative skills as you were growing up. Your combat skills start at a lower level, but First Aid, Doctor, Speech and Barter are substantially improved.

traits.name: Chem Reliant
traits.description: You are more easily influenced to chems. Your chance to be addicted by chem use is twice normal, but you recover faster from their ill effects.

traits.name: Chem Resistant
traits.description: Chems only affect you half as long as normal, but your chance to be addicted is also only 50% of normal.

traits.name: Sex Apperal
traits.description: You've got the "right" stuff. Members of the opposite sex are attracted to you, but those of the same sex tend to become quite jealous.

traits.name: Skilled
traits.description:
Since you spent more time improving your skills than a normal person, you gain 5 additional skill points per experience level.
The tradeoff is that you do not gain as many extra abilities.
You gain a perk every four levels.

traits.name: Gifted
traits.description: You have more innate abilities than most, so you have not spent as much time honing your skills. Your primary statistics are each +1, but you lose -10% an all skills to start, and receive 5 less skill points per level.

skills.name: Small Guns
skills.description: The use, care and general knowledge of small firearms - pistols, SMGs and rifles.

skills.name: Big Guns
skills.description: The operation and maintenance of really big guns - miniguns, rocket launchers, flamethrowers and such.

skills.name: Energy Weapons
skills.description: The care and feeding of energy-based weapons. How to arm and operate weapons that use laser or plasma technology.

skills.name: Unarmed
skills.description: A combination of martial arts, boxing and other hand-to-hand martial arts. Combat with your hands and feet.

skills.name: Melee Weapons
skills.description: Using non-ranged weapons in hand-to-hand or melee combat - knives, sledgehammers, spears, clubs and so on.

skills.name: Throwing
skills.description: The skill of muscle-propelled ranged weapons, such as throwing knives, spears and grenades.

skills.name: First Aid
skills.description: General healing skill. Used to heal small cuts, abrasions and other minor ills. In game terms, the use of first aid can heal more hit points over time than just rest.

skills.name: Doctor
skills.description: The healing of major wounds and crippled limbs. Without this skill, it will take a much longer period of time to restore crippled limbs to use.

skills.name: Sneak
skills.description: Quiet movement, and the ability to remain unnoticed. If successful, you will be much harder to locate. You cannot run and sneak at the same time.

skills.name: Lockpick
skills.description: The skill of opening locks without the proper key. The use of lockpicks or electronic lockpicks will greatly enhance this skill.

skills.name: Steal
skills.description: The ability to make things of others your own. Can be used to steal from people or places.

skills.name: Traps
skills.description: The finding and removal of traps. Also the setting of explosives for demolition purposes.

skills.name: Science
skills.description: Covers a variety of high-technology skills, such as computers, biology, physics, and geology.

skills.name: Repair
skills.description: The practical application of the Science skill for fixing broken equipment machinery and electronics

skills.name: Speech
skills.description: The ability to communicate in a practical and efficient manner. The skill of convincing others that your position is correct. The ability to lie and not get caught.

skills.name: Barter
skills.description: Trading and trade-related tasks. The ability to get better prices for items you sell, and lower prices for items you buy.

skills.name: Gambling
skills.description: The knowledge and practical skills related to wagering. The skill at cards, dice and other games.

skills.name: Outdoorsman
skills.description: Practical knowledge of the outdoors, and the ability to live off the land. The knowledge of plants and animals.

info.title: Armor Class
info.name: Armor Class
info.description: Modifies the chance to hit this particular character.

info.title: Maximum Action Points
info.name: Action Points
info.description: The number of actions that the character can take during one compat turn.

info.title: Carry Weight
info.name: Carry Weight
info.description: The maximum amount of equipment your character can carry, in pounds.

info.title: Melee Damage
info.name: Melee Damage
info.description: The amount of bonus damage your character does in hand-to-hand combat.

info.title: Damage Resistance
info.name: Damage Res.
info.description: Any damage taken is reduced by this amount. Damage Resistance can be increased by wearing armor.

info.title: Poison Resistance
info.name: Poison Res.
info.description: Reduces poison damage by this amount.

info.title: Radiation Resistance
info.name: Radiation Res.
info.description: The amount of radiation you are exposed to id reduced by this percentage. Radiation Resistance can be modified by the type of armor worn.

info.title: Sequence
info.name: Sequence
info.description: Oetermines how soon in a combat turn your character can react.

info.title: Healing Rate
info.name: Healing Rate
info.description: At the end of each day, your character will heal 1 HP for each points of Healing Rate. When you rest, you heal every six hours.

info.title: Critical Chance
info.name: Critical Chance
info.description: The chance to cause o critical hit in combat increased by this amount

characterState.name: Hit Points
characterState.description: How much damage you character can take, before dying. If you reach 0 HP or less, you are dead.

characterState.name: Poisoned
characterState.description: You character has been poisoned. Poison will do damage over a period of time, until cured or it passes from your system.

characterState.name: Radiated
characterState.description:
Your character is suffering from a significant amount of Radiation poisoning,
The more radiation damage, the more deadly the effect.

characterState.name: Eye Damage
characterState.description: This means your character has ben seriously hit in one or both of your eyes. This affects your Perception.

characterState.name: Crippled Right Arm
characterState.description: The right arm has been severely hurt, and cannot function well. If one arm has been crippled, you cannot use two-handed weapons. If bath arms have been crippled, you cannot attack with weapons.

characterState.name: Crippled Left Arm
characterState.description: Your character's left arm has been severely hurt, and cannot function well. If one arm has been crippled, you cannot use two-handed weapons. If bath arms have been crippled, you cannot attack with weapons.

characterState.name: Crippled Right Leg
characterState.description: Your character has a crippled right leg.

characterState.name: Crippled Left Leg
characterState.description: Your character has a crippled left leg.
